work.name: Pop-Up Metro
highlights: Retrofitted retired London Underground train cars as part of a startup to build nation’s first fully battery-powered passenger trains
Improved power capacity and efficiency by revising mechanical/electrical control systems to modern standards

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

projects.name: Lightweight autonomous vehicle⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
highlights: With team of 5 developed firmware stack for self-driving vehicle to be pushed by humans along planned path
Wrote a nonlinear Unscented Kalman Filter (UKF) in C++ to estimate vehicle position and state by processing live sensor data (GPS, IMU) for a custom-built inertial navigation system
Implemented matrix square root in embedded C++ and tuned filter’s system covariance using real-world tests
Developed system for sending and receiving high-precision GPS-RTK packets on Teensy microcontroller through LoRa radio and ROS framework

projects.name: Digital-analog synthesizer modules⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
highlights: Designed and built a desktop synthesizer instrument for creating complex ambient and drone textures using analog circuits and embedded systems
Built custom VCO and VCF circuits to perform various wavefolding and distortion operations using KiCad

projects.name: Open-source wiki platform made with Rust⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
highlights: Contributed to volunteer team of 20 to develop scalable and secure wiki software designed to replace the Wikidot platform, including an internal database backend and web server frontend
Gained experience with industry standard developer tools including issue-tracking with Jira and remote development with Docker and NodeJS

projects.name: ML-driven audiovisualization system⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
highlights: Digitally processed real-time audio signals and OSC messages with a combination of Max and Unity using mel-frequency cepstral coefficients in order to drive data controlling 3D animations
Used a neural network to classify sounds based on frequency features, training data on analog synthesizer outputs
Demonstrated system’s ability to control complex image sequences and transform/deform 3D models in real time performance

projects.name: Experimental stage production⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
highlights: Worked as lead sound designer and assistant sound engineer for college theater organization’s production of Sarah Ruhl’s play Eurydice
Created, synthesized and compiled over one hundred distinct effects and was responsible for designing and directing all aspects of the performance’s sonic identity and its implementation
Handled issues regarding wireless/RF microphones and room acoustics treatment and mixed audio live for audiences in the hundreds
